oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc.operators

Class RAMAndFileJdbcIndexOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.store.DataOutput
      • org.apache.lucene.store.IndexOutput
        • oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc.operators.RAMAndFileJdbcIndexOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, JdbcIndexConfigurable

    public class RAMAndFileJdbcIndexOutput
extends org.apache.lucene.store.IndexOutput
implements JdbcIndexConfigurable
    An Oracle extension of Compass RAMAndFileJdbcIndexOutput class. This class implements an IndexOutput that stores all the data written to it in memory and/or temporary files, and flushes it to the database when the output is closed.

        public static final long DEFAULT_THRESHOLD

      • INDEX_OUTPUT_THRESHOLD_SETTING

        public static final String INDEX_OUTPUT_THRESHOLD_SETTING
        The threshold setting name. See JdbcFileEntrySettings.setLongSetting(String, long). Should be set in bytes.

        public void writeByte(byte b)
               throws IOException
        Writes a single byte. The most primitive data type is an eight-bit byte. Files are accessed as a sequence of bytes. All other data types are defined as sequence of bytes, so file formats are byte-order independent.
